name: Tableau Web Data Connector
description: Enable Tableau users to connect Tableau to a REDCap project for which they have an API token. Project data will be exported on demand and be available for use within Tableau to produce summaries and visualisations.

system-settings.name: Instruction panel text
system-settings.default:
1. In Tableau, search for "Web Data Connector" under Connect -> To a Server -> More
  2. Enter the url displayed above as the "web data connector URL" in the dialog
  3. Enter your project API token
  4. Click Submit - your project data will be downloaded into Tableau

system-settings.name: Connector Page title
system-settings.default: Tableau Web Data Connector for REDCap

system-settings.name: Connector page instruction text
system-settings.default: Select the desired data format and enter your API token, then click "Submit".

system-settings.name: Connector page export format field label
Connector page token input field label
